pages.text: The Zombies you encounter every day wear lots of valuable equipment. But when they die, it disappears never to be seen again.\\No problem if you manage to snatch it from them while they are still alive. Gotcha!

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Small chance for mobs (and other players!) to drop their equipment when hit.\\Max Level: 2\Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Disarming by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Disarming from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and experience for each additional level.
